column4: perhaps iptables is what I need to understand, since I've having trouble using x11vnc, I can connect and see the screen on my edgy box, but can't so anything, can't click, noo keyboard
so I need to research iptables, perhaps port 5900 is bolcked
not if you didn't block it yourself. are you behind a firewall or router now?
beryl will not work with x11vnc
tried that myself last week. all other WM's work
I will go turn off beryl and see if that fixes it, thanks, I'll let you know how it turns out
bery lrunning is exactly what was causing me to not be able to x11vnc into edgy, turned off beryl and works fine now
that's what I thought. somehow beryl does not use convential ways to build the windows and detect mouseclicks. Only had this prob with Beryl so it took me awhile to figure out as well :)
are you thre? I have the answer to using bery with x11vnc
sounds like fun. :)
it works!
fill me in. what is needed?
ok, will fetch the exact link I found, but basically when you run x11vnc just add the switch -noxdamage, simple as that
trying to find it in man x11vnc
ah, got it. will try it out
http://bugs.beryl-project.org/ticket/385
yep. works fine. I would never know to use that option even after reading the man page for it. thanks for letting me know!
I never forget a helping hand
you're lucky. i am good connecting names to faces but terrible with names in general if I have nothing but text to go after. runs in the family that disability.
naw, you're as good, I just have logging turned on in xchat, and looked up who the kind person was that helped me with the beryl/x11vnc issue
that's cheating. but I will start to do the same I think :)
until I do Jowi, works for me :)
